page.title: 14CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content: The{Gardening Club}meets monthly and organises talks,visits and an annual show.The{Social Club}runs weekly bingo and whist and organises outings.The{ {Monday Get Together Club}have weekly meetings,except in summer,and arrange various activities,competitions and speakers.The{Youth Club}failed in Nanstallon,but one is running in Ruthern,based at the Methodist Chapel, organising games,camps and visits.The {School P.T.A.}organise mainly fund raising and social activities on behalf of the school.The Summer Fair has become one of the highlights of the year.The{Methodist Chapel,}run by trustees,holds a weekly service and usual festivals,concerts by visiting choirs and other musicians.The Sunday School holds a Carol Service and annual show.{St Stephen's C.E.Church} -weekly service,festivals,fund-raising
